text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Calling ARod and JLo for advise on virus, using unreviewed "testing" by Dr. Vladimir “Zev” Zelenko to push hydrochloroquine and now this? yep, I feel really safe! You do have experts w/decades of experience. Why no tweets in hours?https://t.co/WJqRvH4vLo
